6// RemovePow is an AST traverser to convert pow(x, y) built-in calls where y is a
7// constant to exp2(y * log2(x)). This works around an issue in NVIDIA 311 series
8// OpenGL drivers.
9//
10
11#ifndef COMPILER_TRANSLATOR_TREEOPS_REMOVEPOW_H_
12#define COMPILER_TRANSLATOR_TREEOPS_REMOVEPOW_H_
13
14#include "common/angleutils.h"
15
16namespace sh
17{
18class TCompiler;
19class TIntermNode;
20class TSymbolTable;
21
22ANGLE_NO_DISCARD bool RemovePow(TCompiler *compiler, TIntermNode *root, TSymbolTable *symbolTable);
23} // namespace sh
24
25#endif // COMPILER_TRANSLATOR_TREEOPS_REMOVEPOW_H_
26
